frontmatter.title: Bioinformatics Project Proposal - Computing baits for metagenome analysis
frontmatter.description: For our bioinformatics project, we had to come up with a project idea, and create a proposal webpage, where we outline the Team, Topic, Goals, Plan of Action, Workload Distribution and References.
frontmatter.author: Anurag Shenoy

frontmatter.title: Gyan - The Machine learning and Data Science FAQ Bot
frontmatter.description: Gyan is a chatbot built using the open source framework Rasa, and can answer frequently asked questions about AI, Machine Learning and Data Science.
frontmatter.author: Anurag Shenoy

frontmatter.title: Mutability in Python
frontmatter.description: In this article, we'll understand what mutable and immutable variables are, and how we can prevent bugs in our code by using them correctly.
frontmatter.author: Anurag Shenoy

frontmatter.title: Encoding Categorical features for Machine Learning
frontmatter.description: There are two common ways to encode categorical features. We can use Ordinal Encoding or we can use One Hot Encoding. Let's explore when you should use Ordinal encoding and when to use One hot encoding in this post.
frontmatter.author: Anurag Shenoy

frontmatter.title: Simple Reddit - Semester long project to show Software Engineering skills
frontmatter.description: Reddit clone built using Golang, Angular & MongoDB. We have used Software Engineering best practices and Agile methodologies.
frontmatter.author: Anurag Shenoy

frontmatter.title: Text Classification on Newsgroup dataset
frontmatter.description: I explore 4 methods used to classify text using the bag-of-words approach, we'll see the code and math required, and then I'll leave you with improvements we could make to these techniques in order to improve accuracy.
frontmatter.author: Anurag Shenoy

frontmatter.title: Bugs when porting from C to Python
frontmatter.description: When porting code from one language to another, we can often introduce unexpected bugs into our code. In this post, I explore one such bug and how to avoid it.
frontmatter.author: Anurag Shenoy

frontmatter.title: Hindi (Devanagari Script) Digit Recognizer using Convolutional Neural Networks
frontmatter.description: Tutorial style Jupyter notebook on how to classify hindi (devanagari script) digits using Convolutional Neural Networks.
frontmatter.author: Anurag Shenoy

frontmatter.title: Building Keras-Dev Docker Container on arm64/aarch64 systems like M1 Macbooks
frontmatter.description: I faced several problems trying to get my keras-dev docker container up and running in order to contribute to keras open-source project. I would like to prevent others from ending up wasting their time trying to solve this, so that they can dive right into the interesting stuff -- contributing to keras.
frontmatter.author: Anurag Shenoy

frontmatter.title: HinDict: A Local LLM Powered Dictionary
frontmatter.description: Dictionary to learn Hindi words using only the romanized form of the Hindi word.
frontmatter.author: Anurag Shenoy

frontmatter.title: Relative Imports & Python Packages
frontmatter.description: How to create packages and import modules correctly.
frontmatter.author: Anurag Shenoy
